subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Antonio Valencia and Ashley Young scored late goals to give Manchester United a 2-0 win at Blackburn, extending its lead to 5 points in the Premier League over its crosstown rival Manchester City.
snippet: Antonio Valencia and Ashley Young scored late goals to give Manchester United a 2-0 win at Blackburn, extending its lead to 5 points in the Premier League over its crosstown rival Manchester City.
